rows.label: tev024901_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024901_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Sullivan about NLA's food supply.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024901_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024901_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Sullivan if anything is troubling her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024901_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Sullivan about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024901_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Sullivan about the plants in NLA.

rows.label: tev024901_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Sullivan about the plants in NLA.

rows.label: tev024901_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask Sullivan about the plants in NLA.

rows.label: tev024901_MSG0001
rows.name:
The food supply that I've helped develop is quite tasty,
wouldn't you agree? ...Hmm? You don't even know
what I'm talking about?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024901_MSG0002
rows.name:
Were you not aware that New LA's food supply
is made out of Miran flora at the integrated
production plant?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024901_MSG0003
rows.name:
New LA has no fields or ranches, and yet we have all
the grain, sausage, and ketchup we need to make a
fine hot dog.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024901_MSG0004
rows.name:
I'm confident that its taste and texture closely mimic
the real thing![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024901_MSG0005
rows.name:
...Hmm? The nutritional value? I haven't really thought
about it. But as long as it's not toxic, I'm sure it's fine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024901_MSG0008
rows.name:
In order to study the plant life of Mira, I've submitted
requests for BLADEs to collect samples.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024901_MSG0009
rows.name:
You are a BLADE yourself, yes? My, my, my!
I'm quite tempted to ask for your help as well...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024901_MSG0010
rows.name:
But the problem is, I haven't yet decided which area
I want samples from.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024901_MSG0011
rows.name: Ah, what should I do? They all seem so interesting...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024901_MSG0012
rows.name:
So we have our storage sample, test sample, display
sample, training sample, sponsor sample, gift sample,
award sample, propaganda sample, and personal one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024901_MSG0013
rows.name:
Yes, this is quite fine. Thanks to the amount of samples
you were able to collect, we have spares at the ready
should our initial research projects fail.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024901_MSG0014
rows.name:
It would cost us the sample I had earmarked as a
contest prize, but these sorts of sacrifices must be
made for the advancement of New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024901_MSG0019
rows.name:
All of the plants growing in New LA are genuine, live
plants that were brought from Earth on the Whale.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024901_MSG0020
rows.name:
That's why we have caretakers looking after them daily
to ensure they don't wither and die.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024901_MSG0021
rows.name:
The annuals are being tended by Ivory,
while Caroline minds the evergreen trees. [ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024901_MSG0022
rows.name:
They are not mere gardeners, but greenskeepers who
guard our verdant heritage![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024901_MSG0027
rows.name:
I've been meaning to ask, [ST:playername ]:
Have you found any sign of the Lifehold section that
contained the botanical database?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024901_MSG0028
rows.name:
It is a database of all Earth's flora, containing both
genetic information and seed samples.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024901_MSG0029
rows.name:
If we find it, we should be able to revive plant species
that we weren't able to transport here from Earth![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024901_MSG0030
rows.name:
My greenskeepers, Ivory and Caroline, have shown
little interest in cultivating the Miran plants I've
recommended to them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024901_MSG0031
rows.name:
They say they would prefer to raise Earth flowers.
I do hope you can find the database for them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024901_MSG0036
rows.name:
I have received word from the Reclaimers division that
the Lifehold segment with the botanical database has
been found.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024901_MSG0037
rows.name:
Apparently it landed in the ocean and was severely
damaged.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024901_MSG0038
rows.name:
The genetic samples are in disarray, and most of the
seeds have been swept away by the ocean currents.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024901_MSG0039
rows.name:
But a Ma-non I discussed it with seemed to think it was
possible to use the data despite its waterlogged nature.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024901_MSG0040
rows.name:
So with that hope, Ivory, Caroline, and I have decided
to begin a new salvage and renewal project.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev024901_MSG0041
rows.name:
We will make this city into a Garden of Eden for both
Earth and Miran flora![ST:wait ]
